# @orbio/orbio-openclaw
> Official OpenClaw plugin for Orbio account discovery, lead generation, and export workflows.

## Canonical
- npm: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@orbio/orbio-openclaw
- Source: https://github.com/orbio-api/orbio-openclaw/tree/main/orbio-openclaw-plugin

## Keywords
- English: openclaw plugin, account discovery, lead generation, sales automation, b2b prospecting, cnpj search.
- Portuguese: plugin openclaw, descoberta de contas, geracao de leads, prospeccao b2b, automacao comercial, busca cnpj.

## Tools
- `orbio_search`
- `orbio_export`
- `orbio_export_status`
- `orbio_command`

## Config
- Required: `baseUrl`, `apiKey`
- Optional: `workspaceId`, `timeoutMs`, `maxRequestsPerMinute`, `retryCount`, `retryBackoffMs`, `capabilitiesTtlMs`

## Security
- No shell execution
- Contact fields masked by default
- Explicit opt-in required for contact fields and bounded by plan allowlist
